oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Federal Reserve Bank Building Under Construction, 1958
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Nashville branch of the Federal Reserve Bank under construction, 21 May 1958. The building was located near the corner of 8th Avenue North and Union Street. Photographed by John Acuff of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
